settings.text:
Just follow few simple steps mentioned below:

  1. Go to our main navigation bar, browse items by category, and select the items you want to buy.

  2. From the product page click on "Buy Now" if you just want a single product to order.

  3. Click on "Add To Cart" if you want to add more products to the cart.

  4. After adding all of your desired products in Cart > Go to the cart > select the products you want to order.

  5. Click on the "Proceed to Checkout" button

  6. Choose your preferred shipping method (Inside Dhaka/Outside Dhaka)

  7. Choose your preferred payment method (Cash on Delivery/bkash) & use coupon voucher code if you have any.

  8. Â Click on the "Complete Order" button
